key_articles.title: Google Photos sees several app improvements

key_articles.title: Google Wants to Get Better at Spotting Wildfires From Space
key_articles.description: A partnership with the nonprofit Earth Fire Alliance and satellite manufacturer Muon Space is giving Google a better shot at tracking wildfires—and using AI to process all the data being collected.
